tool_description:
This API allows you to send data to a discord webhook, and get a detailed response. This API allows you to send simple messages and embeds. Embeds have all possible customization options.
No guarantees for rate limits.
name: Discord Webhook API
title: Discord Webhook API

api_list.name: repeat send message
api_list.description: Enter your webhook URL, enter how many times to send the message, and then specify the message to send. Max 10 messages.

required_parameters.name: message
required_parameters.default: My message that is going to get sent 5 times.

api_list.name: send embed
api_list.description: Allows you to send an embed via a webhook. Read the documentation to get this to work.

required_parameters.name: content
required_parameters.default: This is the content of the embed

optional_parameters.name: thumbnail
optional_parameters.default: This is the URL to the thumbnail

optional_parameters.name: author_icon
optional_parameters.default: This is the URL to the author's icon

optional_parameters.name: author_url
optional_parameters.default: This is the URL that you go to when you click the author_name

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.default: This is the URL to the image

optional_parameters.name: author_name
optional_parameters.default: This is the name of the author

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.default: This is the title of the embed

optional_parameters.name: footer_icon
optional_parameters.default: This is the URL to the footer's icon

api_list.name: multi send message
api_list.description:
Allows you to send multiple messages with a webhook. More information in the docs. Modify the message_count value to the amount of messages you wish to send, and then specify each of the contents of the messages. If you wish to send the same message several times, use repeat send message.
Maximum 10 messages at once.

api_list.name: send message
api_list.description: Allows you to send a message with a webhook. More information in the docs.
